trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Brockville
There were no other sightings in Brockville on or around November 11th 1996
Summary: big ball of white light then 5 smaller lights shot out then vanished
divs: Sighting Detailshunting,when i looked up and saw a huge ball of white light soaring above the tree line straight across going west,then the ball of light shot out 5 smaller balls of light,perfect spacing infront of the big ball,then they all vanished,i said to myself what the heck just happened ,i did feel weird,and didnt tell anybody until today.
